com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm.castlabs

Class CastLabsLicenseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm.LicenseManager
      • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm.castlabs.CastLabsLicenseManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILicenseManager
    public abstract class CastLabsLicenseManager extends LicenseManager
    An extension of the default LicenseManager which provides utility methods for working with the castlabs request and response formats. This class must be extended in order for the application to provide the necessary parameters to build URIs for DRM requests. The derived class must be registered with the SDK via the Android manifest, as documented in LicenseManager.
    • Fields

      protected IAsset mAsset

      The asset that requires the license. Is null until set by a call to LicenseManager.withAsset(IAsset) or by calling LicenseManager.buildWithAsset(Context, IAsset)
      mAssetId 
      protected java.lang.String mAssetId
      The id of the asset that requires the license.
      protected java.lang.String mAssetId
      The id of the asset that requires the license. This id is the one set by you from your catalog. Is null until set by a call to LicenseManager.withAssetId(String) or by calling LicenseManager.buildWithAssetId(Context, String)

      Modifier and Type Static Method and Description
      buildWithAsset 
      static ILicenseManager buildWithAsset(android.content.Context context, IAsset asset)
      Retrieve the LicenseManager instance with an intialised IAsset.
      public static ILicenseManager buildWithAsset(android.content.Context context, IAsset asset)
      Description copied from class: LicenseManager
      Retrieve the LicenseManager instance with an intialised IAsset. The returned instance is of the class specified in the meta-data tag named com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl in the applications manifest. If the application has not replaced the SDK meta-data then an instance of LicenseManager is returned. The default implementation of this method returns a chained call of getInstance(Context) and withAsset(IAsset).
      Parameters:
      context - Context to use for reading the manifest and retrieving the class name.
      asset - The IAsset to be used by the LicenseManager.
      Returns:
      Implementation of an ILicenseManager with an initiliased asset.

      Retrieve the LicenseManager instance with an intialised Asset Id. The returned instance is of the class specified in the meta-data tag named com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl in the applications manifest. If the application has not replaced the SDK meta-data then an instance of LicenseManager is returned. The default implementation of this method returns a chained call of getInstance(Context) and withAssetId(String).
      Parameters:

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      executeKeyRequest 
      byte[] executeKeyRequest(java.util.UUID uuid, android.media.MediaDrm.KeyRequest request)
      The executeKeyRequest method can be derived from ILicenseManager and is reponsible for returning the pure widevine DRM license details as a byte array.
      public byte[] executeKeyRequest(java.util.UUID uuid, android.media.MediaDrm.KeyRequest request) throws java.io.IOException
      The executeKeyRequest method can be derived from ILicenseManager and is reponsible for returning the pure widevine DRM license details as a byte array. These details are put directly into the android MediaDrm framework using MediaDrm.provideKeyResponse(byte[], byte[]) . The android framework does not handle any of the metadata returned in the castlabs response.
      Specified by:
      executeKeyRequest in interface ILicenseManager
      Overrides:
      executeKeyRequest in class LicenseManager
      Parameters:
      uuid - DRM UUID
      request - MediaDrm KeyRequest
      Returns:
      The byte array, suitable for passing into MediaDrm#provideKeyResponse
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - throws IOException

      getKeyRequestProperties 
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getKeyRequestProperties()
      The getKeyRequestProperties method returns a Map<String,String> of headers that should be added to the request to the CastLabs servers This should include the Content-Type header and a custom header "x-dt-custom-data" the "x-dt-custom-data" is a base64 encoded json payload with the following format: {"userId": "USER_ID", "sessionId" : "SESSION_ID", "merchant" : "MERCHANT"}
      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getKeyRequestProperties()
      The getKeyRequestProperties method returns a Map<String,String> of headers that should be added to the request to the CastLabs servers This should include the Content-Type header and a custom header "x-dt-custom-data" the "x-dt-custom-data" is a base64 encoded json payload with the following format: {"userId": "USER_ID", "sessionId" : "SESSION_ID", "merchant" : "MERCHANT"}
      Specified by:
      getKeyRequestProperties in interface ILicenseManager
      Overrides:
      getKeyRequestProperties in class LicenseManager
      Returns:
      Map containing proerly formatted headers for CastLabs request

      getLicenseAcquistionUrl 
      java.lang.String getLicenseAcquistionUrl()
      The getLicenseAcquistionUrl generates a url to request the widevine key information from CastLabs servers Sample URL : https://lic.drmtoday.com/license-proxy-widevine/cenc/?logRequestId=e0ec481a5250e3f64ba24a4b9702d567&sessionId=N37GTPHU&userId=11514946&drmTime=20181127T001820.978Z&assetId=la-monja
      public java.lang.String getLicenseAcquistionUrl()
      The getLicenseAcquistionUrl generates a url to request the widevine key information from CastLabs servers Sample URL : https://lic.drmtoday.com/license-proxy-widevine/cenc/?logRequestId=e0ec481a5250e3f64ba24a4b9702d567&sessionId=N37GTPHU&userId=11514946&drmTime=20181127T001820.978Z&assetId=la-monja
      Specified by:
      getLicenseAcquistionUrl in interface ILicenseManager
      Overrides:
      getLicenseAcquistionUrl in class LicenseManager

      processJSONResponse 
      protected byte[] processJSONResponse(org.json.JSONObject json)
      The processJSONResponse method handles extracting the key data from the json payload returned by the cast labs server Override this method of you need to access additional parameters in the json server response to properly extract the key data
      protected byte[] processJSONResponse(org.json.JSONObject json) throws org.json.JSONException
      The processJSONResponse method handles extracting the key data from the json payload returned by the cast labs server Override this method of you need to access additional parameters in the json server response to properly extract the key data
      Parameters:
      json - JSONObject with the server response data
      Returns:
      byte array representing the key that has been extracted from the json response
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - thrown by response JSONObject
